text: Ust Alloh, ki dar mijoni araʙhoi ʙesavod, ki xonda nametavonistand, na kitoʙ va na risolate dostand, pajomʙare az xudason firistod, to ojotasro ʙar onho ʙixonad va onhoro az aqidahoi ʙotil va axloqi ʙad pokiza sozad va ʙa onon kitoʙ (Qur'on) va hikmat (Sunnat) ʙijomuzonad. Va agarci pes az in ʙi'sati Rasuli akram onho dar gumrohii oskor ʙudand
